about_the_game:
Tribute is a fast-paced roguelike adventure where you play as a determined father trapped in a cycle of death and vengeance, striving to rescue his son and uncover the dark truth behind their endless torment. With every life taken, grow stronger and delve deeper into a story of loss, redemption, and the true cost of your choices.

Battle for your life


Choose from a variety of spells and weapons to give you an edge as you fight through the perils of your quest. Carefully craft your engagement strategy as you battle dozens of unique inmates, guards and bosses - often all at once.

Upgrade your character


Empower your journey to freedom in three distinct ways:
- Harvest the lives of your enemies to unlock over 60 unique upgrades, spanning combat enhancements, new abilities, and game mechanics.
- Scavenge the prison for components to improve your weapons and armor.
- Gain perks throughout your life, each giving you a unique power to assist you on your quest. Customize your build to align with one of five classes, unlocking an even more powerful bonus.

Discover a deep fantasy world


Talk to inmates and explore the prison to uncover the vast lore which precedes the game. Face your internal and externa demons through a branching storyline which leads you through cutscenes and dialogues with your enemies and friends towards one of 15 different endings, each altering your very perception of the entirety of the story.
